mapper.update: update technology.policy_related set pr_title = #{prTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pr_level = #{prLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pr_time = #{prTime,jdbcType=DATE}, pr_file = #{prFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pr_content = #{prContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pr_id = #{prId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pr_id, pr_title, pr_level, pr_time, pr_file, pr_content from technology.policy_related
mapper.update:
update technology.policy_related
policy_related.pr_title = #{prTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
policy_related.pr_level = #{prLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
policy_related.pr_time = #{prTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
policy_related.pr_content = #{prContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where policy_related.pr_id = #{prId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
